class_notes: Through this seminar-style course, we will explore the concept of neurodiversity through an interdisciplinary lens. We will utilize a variety of fields and disciplines to better understand neurodivergent identities and explore how they are an important aspect of diversity. As a class, we will seek to understand what it means to be neurodivergent and identify key personal, social, and societal implications of neurodiversity.
course_description: Highly focused courses, drawing on multiple disciplines of the humanities and social sciences; may be repeated for credit when topics vary.
